PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 18,19 However , to the best of our knowledge , BT / BO - based polymers simultaneously with high field - effect mobilities and high photovoltaic performance are very rare so far.

Let's think step by step.

1. BT/BO-based polymers: These are the type of polymers being referred to in the paragraph.
2. High field-effect mobilities: This is a property or characteristic of the BT/BO-based polymers being discussed. It refers to how easily the polymers can conduct electricity when an electric field is applied.
3. High photovoltaic performance: This is another property or characteristic of the BT/BO-based polymers being discussed. It refers to their ability to convert light energy into electrical energy efficiently.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. High field-effect mobilities (relevant to Material Property)
2. High photovoltaic performance (relevant to Material Property)
